desc: Packed with the world’s most potent turmeric, Shot X accelerates the body's response to alcohol. Shot X supports liver health and prevents rough mornings. Consume post-drinking and get back to life!

layout.text: We are literally (root)ing for your liver. That’s why we made Shot X. From Turmeric roots. Consume it after meals or drinking. We’re here. (Root)ing for you.
